original_title: Parliamentary debate on Easter attacks from 24-26 April
original_body_lines: An adjournment debate on the 2019 Easter Sunday attack will be held from 24-26 April in accordance with a motion brought by the Opposition.

The decision was taken at the meeting of the Parliamentary Business Committee chaired by Deputy Speaker Ajith Rajapakse on Friday (05), as per a press release issued by the Parliament’s Communication Department.
